document.full_text: britain's lee westwood will replace germany's martin kaymer as world number one when the new rankings are published on monday after luke donald failed to win the heritage on sunday.
document.title: lee westwood to take over as golf world number one
lines_and_colors: britain's lee westwood will replace germany's martin kaymer as world number one when the new rankings are published on monday after luke donald failed to win the heritage on sunday.
